      public LibraryController(LibraryService libraryService)

  • Method Details

    • addBook

      @PostMapping("/books") public Book addBook(@RequestBody @Valid @Valid Book book)
      Add new book to the library.
      Parameters:
      book - The book to be added.
      Returns:
      book The book that has been added.

    • getAllBooks

      @GetMapping("/books") public Iterable<Book> getAllBooks()
      Returns the list of books in the database.
      Returns:
      A list of Book Objects.

    • getBookById

      @GetMapping("/books/search/id") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Book> getBookById(@RequestParam Long query)
      Search for a book by its ID.
      Parameters:
      query - The ID to be searched.
      Returns:
      If the book is found, it's returned with 200 OK status code. Else, 404 status code returned with book not found message.

    • getBookByTitle

      @GetMapping("/books/search/title") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> getBookByTitle(@RequestParam String query)
      Search for a book by its title.
      Parameters:
      query - The title of the book to be searched.
      Returns:
      A list of all the books with the query title. If no such books are found, status code 404 is returned.

    • getBookByAuthor

      @GetMapping("/books/search/author") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> getBookByAuthor(@RequestParam String query)
      Search for a book by its author.
      Parameters:
      query - The author of the book to be searched.
      Returns:
      The list of books with the query author.If no such books are found, return 404 status code.

    • removeBookById

      @DeleteMapping("/books/delete/id") public void removeBookById(@RequestParam Long query)
      Remove a book by its ID.
      Parameters:
      query - The ID of the book to be removed.

    • removeBookByTitle

      @DeleteMapping("/books/delete/title") public void removeBookByTitle(@RequestParam String query)
      Remove all books with the given title.
      Parameters:
      query - The title of the books to be removed.

    • removeBookByAuthor

      @DeleteMapping("/books/delete/author") public void removeBookByAuthor(@RequestParam String query)
      Remove all books of the given author.
      Parameters:
      query - The author of the books to be removed.

    • borrowBookById

      @PatchMapping("/books/borrow/id") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> borrowBookById(@RequestParam Long query)
      Borrow a book from the library.
      Parameters:
      query - The ID of the book to be borrowed.
      Returns:
      If borrowing is successful, 200 OK status with success message is returned. Otherwise 400 BAD REQUEST with error message is returned.

    • returnBookById

      @PatchMapping("/books/return/id") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> returnBookById(@RequestParam Long query)
      Return a book to the library.
      Parameters:
      query - The ID of the book to be returned.
      Returns:
      If the book return is successful, 200 OK Status code is returned with success message. Otherwise 400 BAD REQUEST with error message is returned.
